svcproc.title: FENDER MIRROR MOUNTING INSTALLATION -FENDER ASSEMBLIES NOT PRE-DRILLED

para.title: Installation Of New Hood And Fender Assembly Without Fender Mounted Rear View Mirrors

svcproc.para: This section illustrates the installation of the mounting holes required for mounting of the subject mirror assemblies.

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. DIMENSION, 2.50", EDGE OF BASE FLUSH WITH SIDE OF HEADLIGHT
8. DRILL .296 DIA. HOLE FOR THREADED INSERT, 10-32 UNF GRP RANGE .225"
10. DIMENSION 3/4", FROM TOP OF MOUNTING BRACKET

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 29 for all Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Beginning on drivers side of hood and fender assembly mark line 3/8" above top of headlight assembly (Item 4).

From the point of the outboard side of the head light mark point, measure 2.5 inches towards hood, mark point (Item 5). This will locate base mounting plate. Use base mounting plate as template and drill 3/16" dia. holes.
Measure from center line of mounting base along contour of fender 16". Mark and drill 3/16" Dia. hole (Item 2).

At a point parallel with top of headlight assembly, measure up on grille 8.0" and mark point (Item 6). On parallel line with headlight housing , measure 5.25 inches from point on grille. Drill .296 dia. hole (Item 8). Install 10-32 UNF GRP Range 225" Insert (Item 8).

step2.para: At a point 3/4" from the rear of base bracket mark line (Item 10). At a point along center line of bracket mark point on line (Item 11). See Detail "A". Insert 3/16" ID x 7/16 OD x 1/8 grove rubber grommet.

step1.para: Follow same procedure for opposite side of hood for heated mirror assembly.
